TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 883
TEI.2.document_title: Anthony Butler to Stephen F Austin, 11-03-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Anthony Butler to Austin, November 3, 1832. Draft for $50.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 883

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Anthony Butler to Austin, November 3, 1832. Draft for $50.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-03-1832">Nov. 3rd. 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Will please pay *person_mentioned*William Williamson*/person_mentioned* or order one hundred and fifty dollars being in part payment for a *location_mentioned*frame house*/location_mentioned* for *person_mentioned*Col Anthony Butler*/person_mentioned**/p*.
*p**person_mentioned*Anthony Butler*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*by *person_mentioned*Jno R Jones Agent*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*William Williamson*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*'s acceptce. $150.—due*/p*
*p*Recd. Payment *date_mentioned n="11-03-1832">Nov. 3, 1832 */date_mentioned**person_mentioned*N Townsend*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
